sentences.en: A lighted cigarette can ignite a big forest fire.
sentences.cn: 一根点燃的香烟就可以引起森林大火.

sentences.en: A seizure of independence could ignite racial'war in Central Africa.
sentences.cn: 夺取独立可能激起中非的种族之战.

sentences.en: Ammonia - air mixtures are quite difficult to ignite.
sentences.cn: 氨与空气的混合气体不易燃烧.

sentences.en: AS DUSK falls , kerosene stoves ignite in the poorer kitchens of Delhi.
sentences.cn: 黄昏时分, 在德里的穷苦人家开始点燃起厨房中的煤油炉.

sentences.en: Controlled Burn: Ignite 50 enemies capturing one of your control points.
sentences.cn: 燃烧控制:点 燃50个正在占领己方控制点的敌人.

sentences.en: Don't back down but do not ignite the situation.
sentences.cn: 不要轻易放弃最初的打算,但也不要激起现状.

sentences.en: He can score, pass, rebound and ignite the crowd.
sentences.cn: 他能得分, 传球, 抢篮板,煽动观众.

sentences.en: Ignite - Can now be dispelled by any effect that dispels magic effects.
sentences.cn: 点燃(系重击后造成持续伤害的天赋)能被当作魔法效果驱散.无语.

sentences.en: Ignite the magnesium ribbon using a micro burner.
Perhaps it will ignite the fire of their world.
sentences.cn: 或许就会点燃他们世界里燎原的大火.

sentences.en: The band will also ignite new flame of war!
sentences.cn: 乐队也将点燃新的战火!

sentences.en: The bombs ignited a fire which destroyed some 60 houses.
sentences.cn: 炸弹引起了一场火灾，烧毁了大约六十间房屋。

sentences.en: The burning gases can ignite the lean mixture.
sentences.cn: 燃烧着的气体能点燃稀的混合气.

sentences.en: The recent fighting in the area could ignite regional passions far beyond the borders.
sentences.cn: 最近该地区的战斗可能激发边境以外整个地区的激动情绪。

sentences.en: The rocket rises and we can see the second stage ignite.
sentences.cn: 火箭升高了,我们可以看到二级点火.

sentences.en: When the moment is right, we will ignite the Beacon of the Liberty!
sentences.cn: 一旦成熟我们就点燃这个自由女神的火炬!

words.tran_cn: 点火，点燃；着火，燃烧；点火开关，点火装置
点火器；引爆装置；[电子] 引燃电极

trans.tran_en: to start burning, or to make something start burning
When you ignite something or when it ignites, it starts burning or explodes

trans.tran_cn: 点燃，使燃烧，使激动，使灼热
trans.tran_en: to start burning, or to make something start burning
